TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowDesignerColors extends System.Object
public ref class WorkflowDesignerColors abstract sealed

summary.span: 使颜色和颜色渐变能够与 Windows 工作流设计器用户界面中所使用的元素和外壳条形图的各个方面关联。

span.span: Enables colors and color gradients to be associated with aspects of the elements and shell bars used in the Windows Workflow Designer user interface.
